def compare_schemas(schema1, schema2):
    fields1 = set((field.name, field.dataType) for field in schema1.fields)
    fields2 = set((field.name, field.dataType) for field in schema2.fields) # can add field.nullable for more accuracy
    
    in_schema1_not_in_schema2 = fields1 - fields2
    in_schema2_not_in_schema1 = fields2 - fields1
    
    return in_schema1_not_in_schema2, in_schema2_not_in_schema1

def apply_df_to_table(df, db_name, table_name):
    
    # Write the DataFrame with the new column to a new temporary table
    temp_table_name = f"{db_name}.temp_table"
    spark.sql(f"DROP TABLE IF EXISTS {temp_table_name}")
    df.write.mode("overwrite").saveAsTable(temp_table_name)

    # Drop the original table
    spark.sql(f"DROP TABLE IF EXISTS {db_name}.{table_name}")

    # Rename the temporary table to replace the original table
    spark.sql(f"ALTER TABLE {temp_table_name} RENAME TO {db_name}.{table_name}")
